name: Pizza Boy Steve Plus
description:
Pizza Boy Steve is back! Delivering pizza in 30 seconds or less!

Pizza Boy Steve Plus is an updated version of Pizza Boy Steve, now featuring new costumes, game modes, and improvements.

In classic mode, deliver as many pizzas and make as much money as you can before the timer runs out. If you want a little more fun and challenge, then play party mode, which adds random handicaps for every $10 you earn!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move
Enter to pause
Use mouse for clicking things

Music by FourD
